name: TVS Apache RTR 160 4V
description: It is available in 6 variants and 4 colours with top variant. The TVS Apache RTR 160 4V is powered by 159.7cc BS6 engine which develops a power of 17.39 bhp and a torque of 14.73 Nm.

name: Honda SP 125
description: The bike is available in 2 variants with 4 colour options. The 124.0 cc engine of SP 125 is mated with 5 gears, producing maximum power of 10.70 bhp @ 7500 rpm.

name: Yamaha MT-15
description: Yamaha MT 15 is a street bike.This is a Pure-bred hyper naked, one of the most dynamic light weights from the MT stable.It had 4 variants and 4 colours.

name: Suzuki Hayabusa
description: The Suzuki GSX1300R Hayabusa is a sports motorcycle made by Suzuki since 1999. It immediately won acclaim as the world's fastest production motorcycle.

name: Suzuki Gixxer SF
description: Suzuki Gixxer SF is a sports bike.It is available in only 1 variant and 3 colours. It is powered by 155cc BS6 engine which develops a power of 13.4 bhp and a torque of 13.8 Nm.

name: Apache RR 310
description: The TVS Apache RR 310 is a sport bike made by the TVS Motor Company. It uses a 312.2 cc single-cylinder, four-stroke, SI, liquid-cooled, DOHC reverse inclined engine.

name: Kawasaki Ninja H2R
description: The Kawasaki Ninja H2R is powered by 998cc BS6 engine which develops a power of 305.75 bhp and a torque of 165 Nm. With both front and rear disc brakes.

name: Ducati Panigale V4
description: It is available in 3 variants and 3 colours. Powered by a 1103 cc bs6 engine,it has a 6-Speed gearbox. The Ducati Panigale V4 has Disc front brakes and Disc rear brakes.

name: Ducati Streetfighter V4
description: It is available in 3 variants and 3 colours. Powered by a 1103 cc bs6 engine, also has a 6 Speed gearbox. The Ducati Streetfighter V4 has Disc front brakes.

name: Yamaha YZF R15 V3
description: It is available in 5 variants and 4 colours. Powered by a 155 cc bs6 engine, the Yamaha YZF R15 V3 has a 6-Speed gearbox. The Yamaha YZF R15 V3 has Disc front brakes.

name: BMW M 1000 RR
description: BMW M 1000 RR is powered by 999cc BS6 engine which develops a power of 209.19 bhp and a torque of 113 Nm. With both front and rear disc brakes.

name: Kawasaki Z900
description: It is available in 1 variant and 2 colours. Powered by a 948 cc bs6 engine, the Kawasaki Z900 has a 6 Speed gearbox. The Kawasaki Z900 has Double Disc front brakes and Disc rear brakes.

name: Yamaha YZF R15 V3
description: It is available in 5 variants and 4 colours. Powered by a 155 cc bs6 engine, the Yamaha YZF R15 V3 has a 6-Speed gearbox. The Yamaha YZF R15 V3 has Disc front brakes.
